plot: A millionaire's son, a boy from a small rural village, and the son of an army officer, despite being from different environments, find unity and support while performing their mandatory 2-year military service
title: Doksuli nalgaeleul pyeola
plot_es: A millionaire's son, a boy from a small rural village, and the son of an army officer, despite being from different environments, find unity and support while performing their mandatory 2-year military service
plot_en: A millionaire's son, a boy from a small rural village, and the son of an army officer, despite being from different environments, find unity and support while performing their mandatory 2-year military service
